name: io.github.sns45/better-call-claude
description: Voice Calls, SMS, and WhatsApp for Claude Code with cross-channel context sharing.

environmentVariables.description: Your phone number in E.164 format
environmentVariables.name: BETTERCALLCLAUDE_PHONE_NUMBER

environmentVariables.description: Twilio Account SID or Telnyx API Key
environmentVariables.name: BETTERCALLCLAUDE_PHONE_ACCOUNT_SID

environmentVariables.description: Twilio Auth Token or Telnyx API Secret
environmentVariables.name: BETTERCALLCLAUDE_PHONE_AUTH_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: Your personal phone number in E.164 format (for outbound calls/SMS)
environmentVariables.name: BETTERCALLCLAUDE_USER_PHONE_NUMBER

environmentVariables.description: OpenAI API key for speech-to-text (Whisper) and text-to-speech
environmentVariables.name: BETTERCALLCLAUDE_OPENAI_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: WhatsApp number if different from phone number (e.g., Twilio Sandbox)
environmentVariables.name: BETTERCALLCLAUDE_WHATSAPP_NUMBER

environmentVariables.description: Override Tailscale hostname for webhook URL
environmentVariables.name: TAILSCALE_HOSTNAME

environmentVariables.description: WhatsApp provider: set to 'baileys' for free WhatsApp via WebSocket (no Twilio needed)
environmentVariables.name: BETTERCALLCLAUDE_WHATSAPP_PROVIDER

environmentVariables.description: Path to Baileys auth state directory (default: data/baileys-auth)
environmentVariables.name: BETTERCALLCLAUDE_BAILEYS_AUTH_DIR

environmentVariables.description: Max WhatsApp chat history messages to retain (default: 50)
environmentVariables.name: BETTERCALLCLAUDE_WHATSAPP_CHAT_HISTORY_SIZE
